title: lovelife - Centro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Italian, Western, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Also known as lovelife Juice Bar. Casual place offering juices, fruit smoothies, soups, bagels, salad with spelt, couscous, basmati, or brown rice salads, plus a salad bar to build-your-own salad. Jazz music played in the background. Free Wi-Fi and book exchange shelf. 15-minute walk from Duomo.
